section.title: shipping zones creating new Shipping Zone
section.para: To create a new Shipping Zone, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Shipping Zone, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the name of the Shipping Zone.
Enter a description to identify the Shipping Zone.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Shipping Zone, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the Shipping Zone and adds it to the master list of Shipping Zones.
